Package Game

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Character
  • public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    A Character is defined by its number of gold and the Cell that he is located in, you can access its parameters anytime, add gold to the current balance, each class that extends the class Character must: - have an equal and to string method - be able to calculate its cost per round in gold depending of your game rules.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Cell cell
      the cell that this Character is located on
      protected int nbGold
      the number of gold that this Character has
